about_the_game:
Ancient Dragon spirit card set includes the following digital content :

  • Fenex spirit card: Ancient demon dragon that has been banished to the inferno a thousand years ago.

  • Lucifer the Grandmaster spirit card: Lucifer the Grandmaster of the ancient technique was imprisoned in the ice dragon in the deepest depth of hell.

  • Gemini spirit card: Twin head dragon that summons lightning and thunder with its musical instrument.

  • Nagaz spirit card: Ancient dragon that waged war with humans a thousand years ago.

  • Viper spirit card: Legendary mythical venomous dragon that lives in the forbidden forest. Only a few demons have ever witnessed this dragon.
